title: H2 Database Tutorial and expert Tips
content: H2 DB is an open source lightweight Database written in Java. It ships in JBoss EAP and WildFly application server to speed up developing and testing Java applications. Let’s have a look to the main configuration options and how to create an example application using the H2 DB. What is H2 database? Firstly, let’s see ...  The post appeared first on .
